pullRequest.title: Add data mapping code action
pullRequest.bodyText:
Purpose

Add automatic data mapping code action.

Approach

AI-based automatic data mapping is done in a Python service in Choreo, to which a request is sent with schemas to map.

Samples

Ballerina data mapper examples

Check List

 Read the Contributing Guide
 Updated Change Log
 Checked Tooling Support (#)
 Added necessary tests

 Unit Tests
 Spec Conformance Tests
 Integration Tests
 Ballerina By Example Tests


 Increased Test Coverage
 Added necessary documentation

 API documentation
 Module documentation in Module.md files
 Ballerina By Examples

commit.message: [data-mapper] Add AIDataMapperCodeAction file and update build.gradle file
[data-mapper] Add a script to build the project
[data-mapper] Extend function to handle one char variable names
[data-mapper] Remove packageID from generated mapping function
[data-mapper] Format code according to WSO2 style guide
[data-mapper] Update code action to neglect field assignments
[data-mapper] Set the AI end point via env variable
[data-mapper] Modify the AI-end point environment variable check
[data-mapper] Modify the AI-end point environment variable check
[data-mapper] Change code style to match checkstyle standards
[data-mapper] Edit build.gradle to get ballerina-1.2.0 packages
[data-mapper] Add constatnt declartions for reused constants
[data-mapper] Modify build.gradle to release and publish
[data-mapper] Prevent hard coding data type tags
[data-mapper] Add functionality for array data types
[data-mapper] Add source code for VS Code plugin
[data-mapper] Change method of parsing response JSON
[data-mapper] Add functionality to disconnect connection after using
Add configs for data-mapper code action
Add test classes for data mapper code action
Format code to comply with best practices
Add PowerMockito to mock backend service

nodes.bodyText: Can we define set of constants for these fields as we are using them in multiple places. Then we can find the usages easily and change easily in future if requrired.
Should be = new HashMap<>();

Why readTimeout is passed as a parameter as it is constant. Also for connect time out also, we have used a constant value(15000) but it is not passed as a parameter or defined as a constant. Can we follow the same convention for all the properties?
We have only one usage of buildResponse function. So why do we need to pass throwError as a parameter which is always false.
Input parameter headers is unused.
Please add license header for all .bal files as well. Check all the places.
